JmsRealms
JmsRealm
Other
A JmsRealm is a definition of a JMS provider, and is kind of a utility class to prevent the tedious work of repeatedly defining all parameters to connect to a queue or topic.
This class is not an extension of JNDIBase, which would be logical, because in the JMSBase class the function PropertyUtils.copyProperties is used, which cannot handle this.
See also
Github - JmsRealm Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.jms.JmsRealm
Syntax
Copy
<JmsRealm />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
aliasForRealm	text	-
Includes another realm into this one
realmName	text	-
Set the name of this realm

queueConnectionFactoryName	text	-
Set the name of the QueueConnectionFactory

topicConnectionFactoryName	text	-
Set the name of the TopicConnectionFactory

datasourceName	text	-
securityPro
